Question: With Corwin gone, this person moved out of the Schiller Building and into the nearby and newly completed Steinway Hall Building.
Hints: As with the residential projects for Adler & Sullivan, this person designed his bootleg houses on his own time.
Another son and architect, John Lloyd ****, invented Lincoln Logs in 1918, and practiced extensively in the San Diego area.
He also adopted Svetlana Milanoff, the daughter of his third wife, Olgivanna Lloyd ****.
